channel.title: ## Certain Ammount Of People In Your Server ##
channel.description:
Ok, I want to make it so when there's 23 people in my server, no one else can get in until there's a free space..
Is this possible? If so please post a code and where/what file do I put it? :)

no, cause nobody wants to hear you bitch

item.title: ## Certain Ammount Of People In Your Server ##
item.dc:creator: @Steviie Steviie
item.description:
@Steviie wrote:

Well, everyday I see people flaming threads, people aren’t getting the help they ask for (not just me)

Yet, sometimes they don’t get the help. That’s the point im getting at… So i have a right to complain

item.title: ## Certain Ammount Of People In Your Server ##
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Steviie, post:8, topic:136543”]FOR FUCK SAKE!!! EVERY TIME I POST SOME DICK POSTS SOMETHING COMPLETELY AND UTERLY PATHETIC!!! (LEGEND)
THEN I TELL HIM TO LEAVE AND CONTINUES TO ARGUE.
THEN MY TOPIC KEEPS GETTING FLAMED!!!

I WISH MODS WOULD ACTUALLY DO SOMETHING FFS
PLEASE NO MORE FLAMING IN MY TOPIC… I NEED HELP … NOT A LECTURE[/quote]
I saw your report.
Isaac doesn’t flame you really.
Sorry but instead of reporting others you should have reported yourself (Not possible anyways).
Your the one using full caps and flaming words.
If you want a mod does something you report the right person.
Otherwise don’t complain please.

Read full topic
